Text:
Hi 20-40,
Thanks for the encode/upload.

@ ALL - Please login and click the [+] symbol beside QUALITY at top of page for ALL torrents from 20-40. 
It makes a difference, shows you care and that his work is appreciated for the genius that it is!

Cheers
Jon

Thanks for your work in uploading these "diet" versions  of the shows. I regularly download your Stargate Universe, Smallville, & Sanctuary. I live in Africa so have a slow connection. 350MB usually takes a day and a half. Yours can be downloaded in about eight hours. They look GREAT on our 25" analog TV - actually I can see no difference from 350MB files. Keep up the good work!
